resources.string: Are you in an urgent situation? Ask for assistance immediately!
Anytime there is an emergency we will inform you with alert notifications. When you receive an alert, you are encouraged to follow the instructions included to stay safe.
Anytime you seek medical advice from a licensed doctor, this chat room will come in use. You can type messages anytime on any matter, to describe the problem you have.
To send a message, click on the input field near the bottom of the activity. Then, carefully type your message and press the enter key on your keyboard to send it.
Your messages are always shown on the right hand side of the screen and bare your name on top of the message bubble.
When a licensed doctor replies, your will see their messages on the left hand side of the screen and bare their name. Please comply with instructors and ask for clarification if nessesary.
The home activity allows your to access driving mode, disability mode and the panic button.
The two modes are able to assist you with every day tasks and provide medical care in case of an emergency.
Whenever you are driving, you can enable this mode to control your driving speed.
In case of a speeding violation, you can check out the map overview for detailed markers.
If you frequently lose your balance when walking, you can enable this mode to increase safety.
In case of a sudden acceleration spike, which can be caused by a fall, we can call for assistance for you.
When something\'s not right, you can press the panic button to make rapid calls, texts or get in touch with a hospital.
Click enable button to start speed capture.
Click disable button to stop speed capture

Click violations button to display all violations. You ca filter the violations by clicking the filter floating button! You can filter by custom date or you can display the violations of the past week!
Click the \'more\' button of a violation to display its details.
You can navigate through the map and see every place where a violation has been committed.
Click the dots on the top right corner to edit the application settings. You can configure the speed limit! (Default 50 kmh)
On the main screen, click the floating button with the microphone to enable speech recognition! You must start your command saying \'speed\' or \'speedometer\' and then one of the following words:
1. \'start\' to enable the speed capture. 2. \'stop\' to disable speed capture. 3. \'violations\' to go to violations list. 4. \'map\' to go to map.
If you click the floating button with the microphone you can enable speech recognition! You can execute your command by saying one of the following words:
1. \'Send message\' to send the emergency email and text message. 2. \'Call Hospital\' to immediately call the hospital. 3. \'Call emergency contact\' to immediately call your emergency contact.
Press the send message button to immediately send an email and text message to your emergency contact
If you need to call a hospital immediately press the call hospital button
If you need to call immediately your emergency contact then press call emergency contact button
Warning! You have exceeded the speed limit.
Initialize speech recognition say \'speed\' or \'speedometer\' following by your command!
Start with \'speed\' or speedometer following by your command!
Are you ok? Do you need help?
SMS Failed to Send, Please try again
There is no email client installed.
I need help, this is urgent!!!
The available commands are \'send message\', \'call hospital\', \'call contact\'
The available commands are \'send message\', \'call hospital\', \'call contact\'
Log in using your biometric credential
Please try one of the following commands: doctor, alerts, driving mode, disability mode.
